about_the_game:
It is a single-player 3D scene puzzle type game that interacts with objects in a room from a first-person perspective to find a way to the next room. The game is made up of high-quality models, bright skies and warm sunlight, so find your way to the next room in this cozy room!

Foreword


- Welcome to this cozy room, there seems to be a little puzzle here, can you find the puzzle and the puzzle solution?if you can find it, the reward is - the next room.

Gameplay


- Finding the key in the room from a first-person perspective or other method to open the door.

- Have more than 10 playable individual levels (new levels will continue to be made).

- There are no complex puzzles, no horror elements, just some strange sights and events, and the dream core is the tone of the game.

Notes


- It is recommended to use a medium to high-performance graphics card to play.

- Please keep the graphics card driver updated in order to experience the ray tracing function in the game (if the graphics card driver version is lower, the ray tracing function may not be enabled, and the driver upgrade will be prompted when it starts).

- If the frame rate is low, you can try to turn on the window mode and reduce the game window resolution to play.

- There is only a small amount of simple English text in the game.

Please contact me if you would like to do the following, please feel welcome!

- Feedback on bugs and issues encountered in the game
- Willing to provide sponsorship to give developers motivation
- Willing to participate in the design and development of the game with me
-

highlighted.name: No one can refuse to press a button

name: Next Room

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650(16GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12650H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060(16GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
